title: Whirlpool 265 L Frost Free Double Door 4 Star Refrigerator  (Magnum Steel, IF INV 278 ELT Magnum Steel (4S))

product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Unit and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Whirlpool
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Adaptive Intelligence Technology: Be it storing leftovers from last night’s dinner or your favourite fruits and vegetables, this refrigerator features, the Adaptive Intelligence (AI) Microprocessor and three Intellisensors that sense load, weather conditions and usage patterns to facilitate optimum cooling so that its contents stay fresh for a long time.
product_description.MicroBlock Technology: You don’t have to fret about bacterial growth as this refrigerator’s vegetable crisper, as well as its fruit crisper, boast the MicroBlock Technology to prevent bacteria from affecting the freshness of your fruits and vegetables.

review:
Loved the design, finish and product quality. The alignment of the space is well designed. There is a separate section for storage of fruits and veggies which I quite like. Cooling is very good though this would be tested better during summer’s. Only missing thing is there should have been a separate light in the freezer section.
Overall happy with this purchase.

Very fast delivery and good product ..but I want dark gray color one..that's thing disappointed. overall good ..looking nice ..price also reasonable ..demo also good and simple ..after few months use.I wil rewrite the review

Refrigerator is good but now as per 2020 electricity it is rated as 3 star and as per 2019 it was 4 star
Overall function is good and in budget as well

Delivery was on time as usual but installation took three days as per service center flipcart logged complaint after two days of delivery. Does hos job silently. Ice making is fast (I am not telling about quick chill function. in normal mode also ice gets ready fast) Freezer also have enough space. Power consumption I have to check once I receive this month electricity bill.
I am happy with this product
Very nice product. Working fine from last 3 months. Suggest to go for this product for its nice quality and reasonable price
Good refrigerator with best feature and installation is too good technician is experienced and with good behavior

This refrigerator is vary loving product for all my family members because its style and performance very sleek and sharp. This can handle all type of weather and their temperatures and convert own cooling accordingly to situation. We are so excited to write this review because its price and storage is perfect for value for money. You all can buy this product without and hassle, and I'm sure you'll be love this refrigerator.
Product is good and value for money but company exchange policy is not good as need good condition product in exchange but if old one is good enough than why someone go for new ones

I was not confident before buying this refrigerator during review reading. Keeping hesitate myself, I bought it..I am happy now it is installed and working fine. Design is eye catching and all parts of the product is in proper shape 👌. Highly recommended over Samsung /LG. No installation charges
it is exceptionally awsome and works superb. a great vale to money product

I am writing review of this product after 2 years of installation, suddenly lower half of the refrigerator stopped cooling. Also intermittently sounds came during normal operation. Once enquired about the issue of cooling, it was found that it was an common failure with this refrigerator regarding lower half cooling. Even though after so many complaints, if failure is repeating some how it is questionable to the brand or may be its their strategy for maintenance revenue. Overall, within 2 years with such performance, i will not suggest to go for this brand.
